data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Banten, Indonesia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Banten, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Banten, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Banten, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Banten, Indonesia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Banten, Indonesia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Lampung Pubian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Banten, Indonesia. Please, stir the 341,125 believers here to pray for awakening.
the state of Banten has (about) 341,125 people who know Jesus, 857,011 people who know about him culturally, and 9,434,065 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Banten, Indonesia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Banten
location.cities_list: Tangerang, South Tangerang, Ciputat, Curug, Pamulang
location.cities_list_w_pop: Tangerang (1,372,124), South Tangerang (1,303,569), Ciputat (207,858), Curug (191,406), Pamulang (174,557)
